entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
